mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.origin_content, b.trans_content, b.tag, b.like_cnt, b.view_cnt, b.board_public, b.reply_public, b.report_cnt, b.write_dt, b.update_dt, m.name, i.img_no, i.filename from aim_board b inner join aim_member m on b.member_no = m.member_no inner join aim_generated_img i on b.board_no = i.board_no Order by RAND();
